Protects against corrosion and scale
Increased strength high-performance inhibitor
Treats 125 liters
Maintains heating efficiency
High concentrate formula"

Protects against corrosion and limescale
Prevents boiler noise
Stops frequent venting of radiators
Extends system life
Prevents sticking pumps"

Heavy-duty inhibitor
Protects against limescale and corrosion
Energy Saving Trust Recommended
TripleTech™ Anti-Corrosion Technology
Suitable for all system metals
pH neutral formulation
Ensures optimum system efficiency
Suitable for hard, soft and artificially softened water
Helps prevent the formation of hydrogen gas
A simple test kit is available to check levels

Powerful removal of all major foulants and debris
For all systems, old or new, hot or cold
Ideal with or without power flushing
Exceptional results when power flushing
Harmless to the environment, completely non-toxic and biodegradable

Works with a filter to protect the system against corrosion debris
Inhibitor with a dispersant to aid the collection of magnetite to a filter
Prolongs the life of the boiler, pump & heat exchanger
Designed to be left in the system permanently
Prevents scale and corrosion formation"

Removes system sludge, debris, and scale
Advanced strength formula
Recommended for MagnaCleanse flushing and power-flushing
Restores system efficiency

Removes sludge and scale and restores heating efficiency of the existing system
Removes flux residues and other debris
Compatible with all metals and materials commonly used in heating systems
Easy to use system can be left running normally during cleaning
Suitable for use with all known power flushing machines"

Restores circulation to pipework and radiators
Ideal for cleaning older heating systems
Helps to eliminate cold spots and restore full heat emission
Prepares existing systems for the installation of boilers pumps or panels"

Cleans new heating systems up to 6 months old
Removes installation debris, swarf, flux residues and greases
Powerful, heavy-duty cleaning action
Prevents harmful copper deposits being left in the system
Ideal preparation for X100 inhibitor

Ideal for reducing pressure loss from sealed systems
Seals most weep and small inaccessible leaks
Saves time and money on draining down and repairing
Does not cause blockages of the pump, air vents, etc."

A simple way to seal small inaccessible leaks and weeping joints
Helps avoid costly maintenance repairs
No blocked pumps, valves or air vents
Suitable for all heating systems
Versatile dosing options – via the radiator, air vent or boiler"

First ever wi-fi enabled magnetic filter
Sends system performance alerts to the Adey app
Provides recommendations to help maintain system health
LED light functionality indicating level of magnetic capture
Predicts, prevents, protects

Clean regularly for low-pressure loss, important for reducing energy demands

Supplied with hose union ball blowdown valve and manual air vent."

High powered internal magnet

Treats up to 10 radiators or 100 liters
Removes sludge, scale, and other contaminants

No power supply required, no pollutants released into the system
Can provide whole house or single appliance protection
Long-lasting protection
Fit and forget device, no regular maintenance after installation"

Whole house protection
